website_summaries.verdict: Available in many colors. Compatible with virtually all Bluetooth signal devices. Superior sound quality earns it top marks.
pros: Great sound quality in a portable speaker
Voice-prompted Bluetooth connectivity compatible with virtually every smartphone and tablet
easy to set up and use
cons: Tends to drop Bluetooth connection when changing from direct power to battery power, requiring reset

customer_reviews.title: A good speaker with a big flaw
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the speaker in March 2017, and here 4 months later it has stopped working. I used the below method to reset the speaker and it's working fine again. strange bug for a product line that I've always enjoyed. Plug soundlink in to wall charger - Hold down the play/pause button for 15 seconds. - Then, BEFORE releasing the play/pause button, unplug the charge cord from the unit. - Release the button, - Plug the unit back into the wall charger. - Press the power button, and your unit should power on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, battery isn’t charging. Turns off as soon as I turn it on.
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to have a bose speaker. I finally bought it and love it! It sounds really great but I have used it’s for less than a month and I left it charging for 6 hours because I was going camping and when I got to camp it hadn’t charge, I thought my cable wasn’t working but I have charged other devices with it and worked perfect. I put it to charge today for 4 hours and when Ari turned it on it said “battery low” and shut off. I am kind of disappointed with this speaker. Specially because I have been wanting to get it’s for this long!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria nuñez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound (for its size), but bring your own wall plug...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to pair with an Echo Dot. Setup was very easy - almost effortless. Sound is much better than what the Dot, or even the full-sized Echo, can produce, and I am very pleased with its performance. Deducted one star because it comes with a charging cable only - the wall plug is not included. I'm guessing their theory is that it will be charged by a computer and used on the go. And, yes, "everyone" has a wall plug anyway. But to package a product without all necessary accessories is just not right.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!! Get Sound Link I instead.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this! I bought this in mid-January 2018 & within a month the power just went dead. It wouldn’t charge no matter what connecton I used. Looked on the net for help & found that dozens of other folks have experienced the same problem. Some were able to eventually get it to work again, but many, like me, couldn’t. I also have the original Bose Sound Link & that still works great after more than a year. I highly recommend that over the Sound Link II.
customer_reviews.author: cdale52

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sound but short-lived
customer_reviews.text: As with all Bose audio equipment, the sound quality of this device is superb, but its endurance--not so much. Within less that one month of use, it went dead. Totally. I contacted Bose, and they are sending a replacement, which I hope proves to be a lot more long lived. A word to the wise: save the box and everything that came with the speaker, along with your receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog Product from Bose.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it once. Returned it because it stopped working soon after purchase. Bought it a second time, and it stopped working after initial battery charge. Called Bose. Re-set the processor per rep's instructions and topped off the battery charge. Used it for about 15 minutes. Died again. Completely dead again. Called Bose and was told that it shouldn't do that. Duh. Dog product. Returned for refund and will look for different speaker this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best Bose product I own.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it is a bear to get my phone to synch up. I have to toggle the Bose unit and the phone Bluetooth. Also, the speaker phone does NOT work well with Bluetooth. The volume of the incoming call is terrible. I had to use an aux cable input to get good speaker phone functionality. Last the volume buttons seem to be finicky and require me to press them several times before I get a result. Not the best Bose product by a long way, but it is handy and has good battery life and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect durability
customer_reviews.text: Lets just hypothetically say that I bought this as a gift in December 2017 for an ungrateful person. In September 2018 this same ungrateful person pissed me off, so naturally I decided to destroy this bose speaker. I ran water over it but i noticed the water rolling off. I then submerged it in water and watched until little bubbles formed. I removed it and placed it back. The next day, this same ungrateful person is blasting perfect sound quality music from this damn speaker... al hypothetically of course Needless to say Bose has gained a loyal customer in myself
customer_reviews.author: Chariel

customer_reviews.title: only 3 months of life =(
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth Speaker II - Aquatic Blue on November 2016. It has been working great until yesterday when it died at all. It does not turn on, even changing cables o USB wall chargers. 3 months of life! Unbelievable! Any comment from Bose?
customer_reviews.author: R. Santibanez

customer_reviews.title: A $129.99 BRICK, No longer plays sound, & no warrenty
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a while, but for no reason it no longer plays sound even though the device is paired with my iPhone. A superficial search on google shows that the device in all it’s incarnations has this issue, going all the way back to 2012. From this, I’ve decided Bose has had plenty of time to get the bugs out of this device, so I’m asking Amazon for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Shamp

customer_reviews.title: My no-go travel necessity.
customer_reviews.text: I'm flight attendant and have literally turned my car back around to go back home and get it when I forgot it at home. It gives amazing sound that fills a car or room beautifully. Everybody always looks at it...what is that?It sounds great! Oooh Bose. Listening to NPR podcasts or rocking to my afro beats music library the sound quality is excellent. I can't rave enough about it. Just get one and forget those other small cheap speakers that you won't be able to stand after using this.
customer_reviews.author: sevyna9

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful but has a flaw
customer_reviews.text: ~edit: this has turned out to be EXTREMELY ANNOYING, I am going to try and return it~ The speaker sounds and looks amazing. There is only one thing that I don’t like about it... whenever you pause your music for too long or if you turn your music off the speaker will say “connected to (name)’s iPhone” repeatedly until you turn off the speaker. Also, if you turn off your Bluetooth on your device but don’t walk over and turn off the speaker it will repeatedly say “ready to connect.” It’s surprisingly more annoying than you would think. It would be nice if there was a way to turn off this feature
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: So shocked!, sad and disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It's a Bose product! Sound quality is awesome as always. Louder than I expected from a Bluetooth speaker! Bose never disappoints! I was afraid to spend so much on a Bluetooth speaker, but sooo worth it!! Very happy I did! UPDATE: I've always been so impressed with bose! Obviously. ..^^ It was my understanding they never blew up! My bluetooth now rattles as if it's blown. I am so sad! :-( I don't even listen to it anymore I'm so embarrassed and surprised! It wasn't inexpensive either. But apparently cheap. I've had a couple different bose systems before. Never a problem. Very enjoyable! Sound I craved!!! :-(
customer_reviews.author: MegB

customer_reviews.title: WEIRD GLITCH
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality overall is pretty decent, and the speaker pairs easily with my phone. However this weird thing happened to me-- the speaker died and for some reason went into this mode and wouldn't recharge. I looked it up and apparently it's a common issue. I was able to fix the speaker by going through the factory reset process, but I had to try it multiple times before it turned on again. I also wish the speaker turned off automatically if it hadn't been used for a while, because I often drain the battery forgetting to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super unhappy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Super unhappy with the product. When I first received it it was perfect. No issues at all and really good quality sound. Within the first two months I had to keep troubleshooting the speaker because it’s known to just turn off or go into a power saving mode. But it’s finally just stopped troubleshooting all together and won’t come back on at all . Super sad I always loved the boss product
customer_reviews.author: ZenisSweetPenus

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker almost daily. The music sounds great, and my podcasts have a nice clean sound too. This is super easy to use - my phone synced almost instantly on setup. I will say that once the battery warning says it's on medium, it isn't very long before it runs out altogether. I'd say I easily get the reported hours of battery life promised, but it does seem odd that medium doesn't truly seem to indicate it's in the middle of its battery life. I just know now to start charging it as soon as I hear that little alert. No biggie.
customer_reviews.author: C. Huerta

customer_reviews.title: it dies after few ours of being used... but I found a trick
customer_reviews.text: This speaker had an excellent sound, but it stopped working after a few weeks I got it. The speaker doesn't turn on, even if connected to a powered USB port. Update: Fix: Follow these simple instructions: 1: Plug Soundlink in the wall charger, 2: Hold down the play/pause button for 15 seconds (the three dots button), 3: Before releasing the play/pause button, unplug the charge cord from the unit. 4: Release the button. 5: Plug the unit back into the wall charger. Last Step: Press the power button, and your Speaker should power on again.﻿ If the above instructions don't work as expected, do the same procedure but connecting the speaker to the PC (it worked for me).
customer_reviews.author: M. Ossa

customer_reviews.title: Clean, Crisp, Loud, Durable speeaker.
customer_reviews.text: After going into a Bose store while on vacation, I came across this portable bluetooth speaker. It has amazing sound quality for its size and is very durable. I bring this to the pool, on my patio, in the driveway, literally anywhere I go. It's made of a rubberized material and very compact and travel-sized. This is a water resistant speaker, NOT water proof so make sure you don't submerge it under water or in anything else. The sound quality is loud, crisp, and clear. Connects very easily to not only my bluetooth phone but also my laptop. The battery lasts around 6-8 hours and charges pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: John Betts

customer_reviews.title: 🔊🔈🔊🔈 Poolside Party Time! 🌴🤙🏽
customer_reviews.text: Besides the color everything is perfect. Wish I would of got black but it's all good. All I care about really is the amazing sound this pumps out. I also watched Netflix and got crips perfect sound and zero lag. You won't be mad getting this, but get black just to be safe. 😂📻🔊🔈🔊🔈 Red looks like a hot orange pink, but I'm still good with it to take to Hawaii. 🌴🌴📻🔊🔈
customer_reviews.author: Kaea

customer_reviews.title: Eh its alright.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing! It gets pretty loud with out being distorted. The only thing that bothered me was the batter life. I charge it from dead to fully charged and I can hardly use it for 3 hours before it dies again. I am only using it to listen to my books on cd while cleaning so its not like I am asking to much from it. Ended up selling this speaker to get a JBL charge 3 as my husband has one and I tend to use his more than the Bose speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Kantola

customer_reviews.title: FRAUDULENT Product. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a year. Called Bose to start process of repair. They asked for the Serial Number (found at bottom of speaker); I read to them the number and they replied: "This is not an authorized Bose product." Several times I reread the SN and several times they searched. Even if I wanted to pay to repair the speaker, Bose could not help because it is not a legit Bose speaker. After $129 dollars, and over three hours of lost time, Amazon only gave a us a $75 credit. Dont buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Westerlind

customer_reviews.title: ... this since September 14th and it has already gone bad will not power up
customer_reviews.text: Had this since September 14th and it has already gone bad will not power up. I thought Bose was one of the best. Guess not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This little baby blasts! Really like this a lot - I am a long time bose fan. My only complaint is that I ordered white and I got a color that was more icy blue/gray. I know I got the right one bc the actual blue is VERY blue. Just a heads up to all that the white is not a true white. ....However - I like the color so am keeping it and still giving 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: georgie cannie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and great range
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for Father's day. My dad absolutely loves it. Great sound and great range. It didn't come with the wall charger so he called Bose and they mailed him one free of charge within 48 hrs. The customer service rep said they get calls all the time for the missing charger. That is strange but, if they send it that fast I think it's no big deal. You can use a phone charger while you wait for it.
customer_reviews.author: Chase's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Terrible speaker. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a little over a year then I did a software update and it no longer played audio from connected devices even though the speaker itself worked and I could hear the speaker talk. I’m just outside of warranty and it’s bricked because of the software update. I expect better quality/longevity from Bose. I’ve bought budget speakers at a fraction of the price that have outlasted this one considerably. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Sound disappoints.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with sound. I've been a bose owner of various products for over 10years and this product does not live up to the bose sound. It's no different than a $25 Bluetooth speaker I have already which actually sounds better since that one is stereo and this is mono. Construction is nice but sound is most important and it does not live up to expectations. For reference, I have at least 6 other bose products ranging from home theater to speakers to headphones and earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ram Ram

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good but wish it was adjustable
customer_reviews.text: It is quite bassy, so not great for listening at lower volumes. I wish it could be adjusted to bring out the mids and highs in some way other than just turning up the volume. Other than that, it really is a good little box. Very portable, grippy and connects easily. There's a tiny lady in it who tells you which device you are connecting to. Not sure if I'm supposed to feed her or let her out occasionally. Nothing in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff of the North

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fantastic and a perfect portable speaker. Easy download for Bluetooth. When active or playing music and your phone rings it will alert you through the speaker, nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Boy

customer_reviews.title: If I could, I would rate it a zero star!!!
customer_reviews.text: There are many terrible aspects to this lemon Bose speaker. But the two worst are: 1) when it’s charging, it makes a terrible beeping noise INCESSANTLY and 2) the gosh darn thing charges for hours and then only plays for ONE HOUR AT MOST! It’s truly a horrible purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but...
customer_reviews.text: I like this speaker. I purchased it in May despite the reviews I read about it. So, surprise when mine completely stopped dead this past weekend. It was charging via an outlet, but no matter how much I tried to turn it on or reset it. It would not work. I finally contacted Bose tech support who were very nice, and they are sending a replacement. Fingers crossed on the replacement. Update of replacement So, I received my new replacement in early September, I am sad to report that it too has stopped working. There is clearly something wrong with these speakers and I think I am going to try different ones, or maybe a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: UpIsDown

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Similar to some other negative reviews I have seen of this speaker, it does not last even close to 7-8 hours. It dies after 3.5 hours on a full charge. Very disappointing. Strangely, it is never on "low" battery. It dies while on medium.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Come on Bose - do the right thing!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the Bose Speaker less than a week but the speaker quality is excellent. It is actually the 2nd Bose Speaker in my house. But...how could they not include a wall plug? I mean, seriously, how much more would that have cost Bose? You don't buy a car without a steering wheel included!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Texan Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Run. Don't walk and don't bother with this thing.
customer_reviews.text: It's now 6 days after Amazon's return window and this sucker is dead. Kaput. Lifeless. Ceased to be. Yes, while it was alive it provided nice sound quality but now it won't charge. I went through the Bose forums to find answers and the reboot function did diddlysquat in reviving it. I tried many times and with different wires. Nada. Bose, seriously what were you thinking of producing such a pricey paperweight? Were the engineers asleep designing this thing? There should be the ability to select a single point of the star. One star is giving it too many accolades.
customer_reviews.author: Silvana D.

customer_reviews.title: Died after about 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: So, I will say that the Bose sounded great for it's short lifespan of 2 months. I bought this as a present for my wife and two months in, it just stopped working. I contacted Amazon and they thought that it might be a bad charging cord. So, I bought another charging cord. Nope! Wasn't the charging cord. I tried to call Bose Tech support but they are closed. So, i am leaving this review so that people know that it might start out great but can very quickly leave you feeling like you wasted $130. I cannot recommend this speaker to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Drum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound- when it works.
customer_reviews.text: When this works, it sounds amazing. Rich full bass, great definition. If I unplug it and replug in the usb power, it will come on and pair and play for about a minute. I usually have to walk over to it and press the power button to wake it up. Then it will drop the Bluetooth connection and go silent. Recommended if you'd like great sound in fits and starts. Summary: great sounding, but an unreliable, overpriced piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: White is NOT white
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with it overall. A couple random observations to pass forward. 1. The white is NOT white. As another reviewer noted (which I didn't see until I received mine) it grayer but not a cool true grey. If I'd known I'd have gone with black - it doesn't blend with my decor as well. 2. You need to activate a button on the speaker to connect even if its a remembered device. (I have another bluetooth speaker by a different company I can connect my phone to without physically waking up the speaker).
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Missing functionality
customer_reviews.text: I have the the original Bose Soundtouch Bluetooth Speaker, the Soundtouch II only works with smart devices with volume controls. If used with a device like an XM radio (dumb device) with an external Bluetooth transmitted it will connect but only at full volume. The volume buttons on the speaker do not function and expect smart device to control the volume. Bose engineering admits feature dropped and said to return it. Support was very poor took two weeks, three phone calls and two emails to identify design fault.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing little speaker! I listen to everything from classical, rock, pop and rap music and this speaker allows me to enjoy it all! Battery life is incredible. Easy to pair. Same quality you've come to love and expect from Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something I could use to play music in my apartment while working - during lockdown. This speaker in white is very stylish and easy to tuck on a desk or a bookshelf. The sound quality is amazing and the battery lasts really well. I bough this one because it has an AUX port and I wanted that option to plug in a laptop or cell phone rather than use bluetooth, if needed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LuluLady

customer_reviews.title: Never charges...diminished quality overall
customer_reviews.text: Had the original soundlink for about 5 years and loved it until the charging port finally gave out. Unfortunately this model has the same problems with the port after just over a month of use plus the overall sound quality is not as good. Why are we using mini usb chargers again?? Really just one of the worst chargers...never makes contact right, bends, breaks, and warps the port. Don’t let it completely die because it’ll take forever to know if the charger is making contact...it’s like dealing with a 5+ year old iPhone except only 3 weeks into owning it. Doesn’t have the bass quality of the original soundlink either
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound for such a little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 of the original ones: Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth Speaker and when our daughter headed to college she took her little brother's with her so we ordered a replacement for him not realizing that this was an upgraded (and even better model). The bass sound is really impressive and the overall sound is very clear. Never choppy or statically despite it being a bluetooth connect. Device has a wired connection too which is great to connect to a laptop for videos / video games. Didn't add a picture this time since it looks exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ward

customer_reviews.title: Not ready yet for real use
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of Bose stuff, and I was excited about these speakers. The sound quality is excellent, but after playing for a while the music starts to break up and skip. I contacted Bose support and they said to download a newer software revision. I did that and the problem might have even been worse, but maybe the same. My phone works fine with other blue tooth systems, including another Bose wireless speaker. I also tried with my IPOD w/ blue tooth, and had similar problems. I would like to own these speakers, but they are very frustrating. I am sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Keane Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it. You're only paying for the name, not quality.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this speaker thinking "oooh, Bose. Should be awesome." It isn't worth the money honestly. The BOSE charging cord doesn't charge the BOSE speaker. Battery life isn't great. It says 8 hour playtime but it didn't last 3 hours. I had to use an old phone charger to charge it. I bought my boyfriend a JBL Flip 4 speaker because getting 2 Bose speakers was way above my budget. Compared the two, JBL Flip 4 is better as far as sound quality, volume, and charging capability. So I ended up returning the Bose and ordering myself a JBL speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific unit. I use it to play music in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific unit. I use it to play music in a large classroom with good acoustics. I was hesitant to purchase because I thought such a little speaker would not be loud enough. It certainly proved me wrong. Bose is a great company with reliable products, and well worth the extra money compared to other, cheaper units. It's compact enough to pack in my music bag, charges quickly, and connects to bluetooth promptly without issues.
customer_reviews.author: btosto

customer_reviews.title: Bose speaker has no response!! Used only 3 times
customer_reviews.text: I have only used my Bose speaker 3 times and now it won’t come on!! It won’t charge acts liked it died and is not responding to anything so I am returning it to you !! Either get me one that works or refund my money please!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge anymore!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this product for less than a year and it won't charge. Tried everything that Bose suggested and ideas from the on-line community but it doesn't charge up anymore. Loved it while it worked but very frustrating to spend a decent amount on what should have been a good speaker to have not work. Heard that there's been issues with this from other people as well. Hopefully Amazon can step in and help with this one.
customer_reviews.author: crey

customer_reviews.title: Its DEAD!
customer_reviews.text: We received this speaker as a gift from our wedding registry, the whole reason we registered for it was because we wanted a speaker that was long lasting and quality which to us previously meant BOSE branded items. I will never buy a BOSE product after this. I have tried all the factory and suggested resets and nothing, it wont turn on and wont charge after 1.5 years of moderate use. Now we need it to leave on at night for our puppy who wont sleep and I am left buying something new. I will not be accepting the $75 product replacement offered by BOSE for something that will likely stop working again, I will take my money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as good as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would have more power and volume than the $20 tinker toy 4 year old Bluetooth speaker it replaced. Nope. Pretty much the same. The cheap old speaker had its own volume control that allowed it to be turned up on its own and outside of the smartphone volume control. The bose speaker is limited to the volume output of the SmartPhone. A real disappointment for a Bose product.
customer_reviews.author: David Crimmins

customer_reviews.title: no way to adjust the bass
customer_reviews.text: Too much bass! Can't adjust. Have to put the main side of the speaker against a cushion to lessen the boom that vibrates the apartment, and probably is felt with other tenants. Have to keep the volume much lower than I would like, which is quite low, to tolerate. Often can't even hear the treble sounds in a normal way. I've had this for over a year, and only recently have been using it a lot. Quite annoying not to have a way to adjust. Listening to Pandora and YouTube with it. Otherwise the speaker is great. It lasts a long time on it's battery. it's highly portable, whatever room you are in. Weight is tolerable for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: mhart

customer_reviews.title: Buttons stopped working after 4 days, 2 months later bluetooth doesn't find my pc anymore
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! And it is fine to take with you in the shower. But the sound is not really that loud. After 4 days the volume buttons stopped working, i have to turn it off and back on and have to choose the volume quickly. I wrote to customer service about it and they couldn't do anything about it. Now since I had it for a 2 months it doesn't reconnect to my laptop anymore. Every time i want to use it I have to manually connect it again, it says it doesn't find the device. I chose Bose because of its great rep...
customer_reviews.author: babette loos

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: this bose has the greatest sound ever. i read some reviews that is stopped working after a few times. well, so far so good . i play music all day for residents in a nursing home. loud enough for them to hear and enjoy. i wanted a red and got the white color. but the white works. didnt want my residents to not have music. . music is everything and this speaker does its job. for the price. .......cant beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Benita E Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't last long & lots of interference from other cell phones
customer_reviews.text: The battery does not last long at all! I'm constantly having to charge, very annoying. It will connect with my phone and my husband's phone automatically, unless one of us turns off our Bluetooth completely. If we are both connected, and I'm listening to music, anything he does on his phone interferes and makes the Bose cut out. Every single day I have to text him to turn off his Bluetooth. It's really quite annoying also. If I were to purchase another portable, Bluetooth speaker, it wouldn't be this one. I want to love it, these two issues are just irritating.
customer_reviews.author: MikeThomason

customer_reviews.title: Stopped turning on
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for less than 2 years and it will no longer turn on. The last time I put it away I made sure to fully charge it and I really only use it occasionally. I've gone through all the troubleshooting steps that I've found online and even contacted Bose support. The only option is to pay $75 bucks for a replacement and I'm not going to pay again to replace a defective product. There are many many posts online with similar complaints if you look up "Bose Soundlink won't turn on".
customer_reviews.author: Dennis G

customer_reviews.title: After less than a year of ownership, it won't charge anymore
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was satisfied with this product. It is a small portable speaker, so I wasn't expecting it to be too loud or crisp. It sounds pretty similar to other speaker of the same price and size, it just happens that Bose is a company that I trust because I have happily used their headphones for years. I am a bit disappointed that I can't say the same about this device since I won't be able to use it anymore (it just won't charge) and it hasn't even been a year.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for Conference Calls
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use exclusively on conference calls. The call audio was so bad I switched to my iPhone X speaker rather than continue on the Bose. I tried many different ways and adjusted the volumes as well, but the iPhone X speaker was always superior to using the Bose for a conference call. I did not use it as a speaker, so I cannot speak to its use as a speaker. I have had Bose speakers in the past (I still have a Bose Bluetooth speaker) and they have been great for listening to music. However, this item does a terrible job as a conference call speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Speaker malfunctions and Bose just offers a replacement purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Bose sound link 2 speaker. After about eight months of use, it started having issues with pairing. The battery would also frequently die even though it had hardly been used and was just charged. I tried numerous times to connect with Bose, this was an expensive product. There is no customer service or opportunity for repair. Just an offer to buy another one at $75! Bose, tell me why I would do that when the first one did not work and I cannot connect with someone to help fix it?
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Knepper

customer_reviews.title: Worked nice for almost 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: This thing was nice when it worked. There were times when the bluetooth would freak out and give me a hard time. Battery life was meh. I only ever used this at night for about 30 min, to an hour and never seemed like it held a charge all that great. But i was willing to overlook those things so long as it did it's job. Which it did...for 4 months. Well almost 4 months. The battery just died and never charged ever again. too bad really. This was a nice speaker. As of right now though if you're looking at this i suggest you look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Speaker won't charge after letting battery die.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this speaker as a gift for my girlfriend. The speaker was working great until we let the battery completely die at her house this weekend. Now the speaker will not charge. The return window ended for the speaker 2 days before this issue so now we are stuck with a $100 Bose paperweight. Disappointed that Bose's quality has become this poor and Amazon is selling this speaker even though this issue apparently is common if you search online.
customer_reviews.author: Zack from UF

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy ! Or get extended warranty!!
customer_reviews.text: Was a good speaker but died just outside of the warranty. Had the same thing happen to Bose soundlink mini. Will never buy another Bose product. Good sound but just doesn’t last long. I’ve gotten more life out of Bluetooth speakers I got for free at trade shows.
customer_reviews.author: shannon brooks

customer_reviews.title: Known defective connection port so you can't charge or even plug and play
customer_reviews.text: While it lasted the Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth Speaker II was an awesome speaker. However over time after plugging and unplugging after so many times the port that you actually plug into goes bad and you can't charge or even plug and play anymore. This is now a known issue on these and also the Bose SoundLink Micro which I have also ordered. Although at this time the Bose SoundLink Micro haven't had the issue yet. Perhaps because I haven't used it as much. Everything is perfect with this except for the issue I mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last too long...
customer_reviews.text: Updated 9/29/20: I will NEVER buy these again. I have had 3 of these speakers and each one had died just after a year of regular use. The sound is great, but they are way too expensive to be this bad in quality. The company will let you BUY a replacement at a discounted price, but that is still ridiculous. A $130 speaker should last longer than a year. I love these but I have had 2 die and need to be replaced. One lasted a few months and another one lasted about a year and a half. They are too expensive to have this happen!!
customer_reviews.author: Mountainsandstuff

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker! Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker! I've had it for a couple years now and it's the best speaker I've ever owned. I was hesitant to spend so much on a speaker since I never really owned one but this was a great choice! I love how portable it is. Battery lasts a long time (I use it heavily on a daily basis) and the durability over all is great. I've dropped it, spilled water on it, it fell into a chlorinated pool (TWICE!!!!) and it still works like new and I haven't had any problems with it. Always connects to whatever device I am using and setup is easy. Highly recommend this speaker
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be more dissatisfied with this purchase. It turns on randomly, beeps uncontrollably, turns off randomly when the battery is medium or even high. Sometimes it gets staticky and other times It’s fine, even at the exact same distance from the computer it’s connected to. The worst part is the beeping. All the time while it charges. I’ve done a factory reset a bunch of times. The thing is just garbage.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Portable Speaker with Amazing BOSE sound
customer_reviews.text: We are very much a BOSE household, because we love their products. The Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth Speaker II - Limited Edition, Midnight Blue (Amazon Exclusive) is a portable speaker which can be taken with you, pretty much wherever you want to go. It's small enough to fit in a small bag or backpack, easy to connect, and the sound quality is pretty darn good. While this speaker is not meant to replace a home sound system, for a portable Bluetooth-connected speaker, you cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Avila

customer_reviews.title: Used to Love this Speaker
customer_reviews.text: The speaker sounds great, but the battery was low the other day and I charged it for some hours now. The battery isn't charging or showing a light indicating that it is charging. I'm highly disappointed that now I can't use this speaker that I've grown to love. It no longer chargers and is completely dead. *EDIT* Since contacting Bose, I was able to get a replacement easily. Their customer service is awesome!!! Now I have a working device that I love.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: bose soundlink stereo
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought was defective would not play. I contacted Amazon, they sent out the same color replacement and I received it within 24 hours... This new one was a breeze to set up... I would highly recommend..I am listening to sirius radio from my iphone 11pro,,, through the boze soundlink speaker... love this.. I especially like when my daughter and I are together and wanting to listen to the same thing, we can dock each of our bose soundlink stereos together...
customer_reviews.author: gailann

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good until you ignor it for a month
customer_reviews.text: This device sounds and works good until its ignored for one month. It is very important that the Bose SoundLink Color's charge isn't allowed to drop below a certain level or it will not charge at all, until a special "reset" procedure is performed. What's even more troubling is that the special reset procedure isn't found in the owners manual supplied by Bose, but on online websites, and youtube videos. This product doesn't live up the the quality that one would expect from a Bose branded product.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent L.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one a year ago to play on our patio. It worked great for the summer season. When I pulled it out to play this spring, it would not charge. I tried to update the unit per recommendations online. No help. We really liked the speaker, so I bought a second one. We used it for about a month and again the ability to charge has failed.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Problems from the start
customer_reviews.text: This speaker did not live up to the reputation associated with the Bose brand. First off, it would not charge quickly- and would lose charge extremely quickly. In fact, there were problems charging this speaker despite every single trouble-shooting procedure outlined online and in videos. After 2 days of futile attempts, it was time to send it back. I have since bought a JVC Bluetooth speaker which is terrific in every regard - and even cost a bit less.
customer_reviews.author: S. B. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Love it but sending back for replacement...UPDATE!!
customer_reviews.text: For a portable speaker sound is strong and clear true to the Bose name. Material is a plastic covering that helps it from not slipping off the hands or countertop...however mine quit streaming music although connected and after trouble shooting with Bose customer service a second time, Bose themselves determined it defective. Bummed out and scared the replacement will fail me too. Will update review once it arrives. UPDATE!! The replacement came quick and the speaker has been working PERFECTLY since!!! Love it so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Yani

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: I have several bluetooth speakers and bought this one to be able to take it with me to rehearsals. It never worked, not from the day it arrived. It powered up, but would not connect to ANY device I tried. In the middle of the night, one night, my Alexa suddenyl connected to it and it BLARED throughout the apt. The volume wouldn't turn down. I turned it off. Turned it back on, it wouldn't connect to Alexa. Sigh. What a piece of crap. And it ISN'T RETURNABLE. DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Island Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Two bad speakers in a row
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth speaker from Amazon. It sounded fantastic. The feel and size are great. But in less than a month of light use it would not charge. I called Bose. They spent a long time with me on the phone. I mailed the speaker to them. I received a replacement. Same problem, no charge shortly thereafter. I would not recommend buying this speaker. I want a speaker that works and while the people at Bose were polite, I don't want to spend an hour and a half (hold time, talk time, go to the mail time) fixing this purchase. Good luck in your speaker decision.
customer_reviews.author: H. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Had to send back
customer_reviews.text: After just over a month of having this speaker is just started playing very loud static... had to send it back. I had bought the older version about 3 years ago that lasted much longer but the blue tooth stopped working and eventually completely stopped
customer_reviews.author: traci p.

customer_reviews.title: Joke of a speaker. Might return it.
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the worst speakers on the market. Sound quality- for the price, it should be illegal. The sound is distorted from a distance and from the back. You can only hear decent sound when directly in front of it. There are cheaper speakers that are way better. JBL flip 4, Tribit and Anker to name a few. Another thing that is annoying is that when it's connected and idle, a robotic voice will keep saying connected to phone every minute. I expected more from Bose
customer_reviews.author: Neel. P

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working out of nowhere
customer_reviews.text: I still have the first generation and it works great. I’ve had it for 3 years and It’s gone through bumps, falls, on boats, etc. still working. I bought this one four-five months ago and it just flat out stopped working. I’ve tried multiple times to turn it on, different outlets, letting it charge for hours.. nothing. Its never gone anywhere. It’s been sitting on my mantle since I opened it. I’m pretty bummed.
customer_reviews.author: christian

customer_reviews.title: All About That Deep Bass
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived I actually lamented to my husband, we don't need "another" bluetooth speaker. We have some they are fine. However, this is far and away the best blue tooth speaker we've ever had. We've used it all weekend out by the fire pit. It's perfect. it gets LOUD and has a nice deep bass. It's perfect for outdoors. We compared it to a couple of other speakers we had and this one was far and away a superior product. It's a slim sleek design so it's easy to "hide" if you want to keep it out of sight. I wouldn't go so far to say my husband was right...but it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am someone that appreciates sound quality and prioritizes it with any speaker/system I am playing music on. I wanted to find a waterproof/splashproof bluetooth speaker in the $100 range, and chose Bose as I always had good experiences with the name. This speaker’s sound quality is terrible. I dont expect too much from a portable speaker this size, but I have a sony speaker that is years old and half the price and it sounds much better in comparison. I generally do not go out of my way to write reviews, but as someone that needed good sound quality this did not come close to satisfying. The JBL Charge 4 is the same price, I would recommend that.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a sound expert, but standing in a retail store trying several speakers demonstrated this was indeed the best. I picked this up when this color was on sale. Couldn't beat $80 for this sound gem! i can hear everything clearly throughout my 2,100 sq ft house with this thing!!!!! I also have a comparable JBL speaker. It's good, but honestly, nothing beats a BOSE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skipping music with low volume
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would live up to the product’s name. However, even from the first time I’ve started playing it, the music will play fine for awhile and then just start garbling/skipping. I have to power the system off and back on to get it to reset. I’ve tried this on multiple Bluetooth devices. I’ve even tried the reset’s that are on the support pages. Amazon unfortunately won’t take a return for it, so now I have to fight my way through support. I’ve been trying to contact support to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Root

customer_reviews.title: Never worked correctly. Bad purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Wrong decision this item. I bought it last January and it works for a couple of hours then it stops funtioning. The lights on top continue on but showing a confusing array. I have taken this item to the HOSE franchise holder, they update the software but the configuration is lost after a couple of hours of using the item. I returned the item to BOSE in Illinois, they refused to give me a refund, instead they sent me back the same speaker and it lost configuration, again, after two hours of use. Money lost. Don't buy anything from these people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great! Use it almost everyday.
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost every day to try and pump myself up for another grueling day at work. Its got great sound and volume and is good for blasting music so you can drive away the thoughts of just how much your job sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn’t charge anymore I want to return this but window for return is over
customer_reviews.text: I only used this speaker a few times now it doesn’t want to pick up charge anymore it just keeps blinking and then charging stops.Window for return is already done. That’s wasted money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not charging
customer_reviews.text: After about a year, my Bose speaker is no longer charging. Anyone else having this issue? I'm quite disappointed as Bose comes with such a solid reputation. I am not happy and will not replace, for the cost, there are much cheaper alternatives considering the shelf life of this.
customer_reviews.author: KLB

customer_reviews.title: Loved it - until it wouldn’t charge - how do I return this?
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, one of these speakers is faulty and won’t charge when plugged in - and I’ve purchased these as gifts for several family members - but if there’s no warranty, it’s a useless speaker after 6 months of minimal use. How do I return this please - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Pulled the trigger as a Father's Day gift. Dad loved it - looks beautiful in the kitchen and sound is great. Plug and play with Bluetooth and works well with multiple devices
customer_reviews.author: PackyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Stopped recharging just over one year after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sound WAS great. Battery life WAS great. Bluetooth connectivity WAS great. Up until a few days ago when the battery died and it will no longer take a charge. I tried everything, submitted a warranty claim but was denied. However they did offer a replacement discount, send them $75 and my old one. I really thought BOSE was better quality than that. What good is great sound if you have to replace it every year?
customer_reviews.author: A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: worst speaker ever, dies and does not charge
customer_reviews.text: If the speaker runs out of charge, you have to do a ridiculous hard reset (found that out only after searching the internet), and even then, my unit is dead only after 9 months. Tried updating the software at btu.bose.com, but that failed as well. NOT RECOMMENDED unless you want to waste your money. I contacted Bose, and they offered a new unit at a reduced price, but why would I spend more money to replace a faulty speaker with another one?!? Horrible, flawed speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Chun

customer_reviews.title: a lot more reliable than JBL
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 JBL speakers break in one year and I have had this Bose speaker over a year now. I wouldnt mind it being a little louder. Its mic function is poor. Its reliable. I trust this brand now and will buy them again. The assistant saying "ready to pair now" over and over is insanely annoying. It takes a little time to connect. Connectivity is strong though. Def would buy. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: peter w middleton

customer_reviews.title: Nice price, amazing sound.
customer_reviews.text: My first Bose speaker, but not my first Bose item. Bought to replace a cheaper speaker that just didn't have much sound, this one definitely does the job. Quick connection and you are ready to go. It's not going to shake the windows, but the quality of sound is beautiful, and it does have enough power for great listening. I also was able to connect with my Alexa, so when we ask her to play music it sounds so much better than her built in speaker. I may buy a second one and hook them together in stereo mode for another added touch.
customer_reviews.author: John Hayes

customer_reviews.title: His favorite Xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son, and I know nothing about it (except that his wife suggested it) . But since he rarely thanks me over and over for something I give him, I'm guessing that it really was the perfect gift. He says the sound is great and I know he's happy with the Bluetooth connection. He uses it in every room in their house - and outside as well.
customer_reviews.author: reader108

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, sounds pretty good - lots of bass
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, sounds pretty good - lots of bass, at times too much bass. Most importantly, the battery life on mine is so terrible that I will return it. It plays for only 2-4 hours before totally losing charge, and if you want to let it sit idle for a day or two between plays, forget about there being any battery left. Also, when the battery is low it won't play even when plugged in. It seems that my item is defective but I highly recommend checking reviews on this site and others before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery only last 2 hours Max (while cranked)
customer_reviews.text: Battery only last 2 hours Max (while cranked) What happened to the 8 hours? Returning it ASAP. If battery life matters to you DONT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Dank

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, get protection plan
customer_reviews.text: This is my second speaker like this. The first one sounded amazing, like this one. But it stopped working in just over a year. I read so many reviews and it’s a mixed bag with these, but nothing beats the sound quality of Bose in my opinion. So I bought the protection plan. This one seems to connect a little easier than the previous one I had. The black sort of gets dirty easily. I had blue before and it looked like you could throw it around like a toy. I thought the black might look a bit more serious and get more respect.
customer_reviews.author: Mms321

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality could use a couple of minor improvements
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good speaker, connecting to the app on my phone does not accurately show the battery percentage like I thought it would it stays stuck at one level and then quickly shows it low. Battery does not last quite as long as I was hoping. Good sound and it is loud but starts to distort after a certain point. It is usually louder than I care to listen to it but still it distorts which I would not expect from this brand of speaker I like that it had a line in as that is what I use to hook into my projector when watching outdoor movies.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine

customer_reviews.title: I like this Soundlink Color II
customer_reviews.text: Bought my second one cuz I like my first one so much, so now my son in law has one too. I bought it with a case for an extra $8, worth it to carry it around. Great Bose sound, plenty of bass for me, and gets pretty loud. Battery lasts about 7-8 hours and you can still use it while it is plugged in the wall charging.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T

customer_reviews.title: Battery and Charging Are Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for under two years... the sound is great and I love the portability. Even the amount of time it holds a charge is pretty good. BUT THREE times I haven't been able to get it to charge. Twice I've been able to do a factory reset and it has powered up and charged. This last time... nothing has worked. My recommendation... stay away and go to JBL. I also have a JBL Charge 3. Yes, it is bigger and heavier, but the sound is great and there are NO issues charging. So Bose... I'm very disappointed. Nothing else matters if the speaker can't be charged.
customer_reviews.author: K9 Mom

customer_reviews.title: Replaced once and 2nd also stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed, finally my old waterproof speaker died and I thought here's my change to get a Bose. First one after a week wouldn't work and they replaced it (love Amazon) the within a month the replacement for the 2nd one died as well. So that was 3 we went through within a 6 weeks time frame. Love my new JBL speaker I got though!
customer_reviews.author: CSee

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging....
customer_reviews.text: As much as I like this speaker, after a few weeks of use it started having trouble powering on. Even when fully charged, the power button would not always work. I found that the way to fix this was to plug it in for a second to "wake it up" and then press the power button. It's not a huge deal, but it's kind of a downer considering the price. UPDATE: After having it for two years now and not getting a whole ton of use out of it, it has now stopped charging. I was never in any harsh environment. It just sat in my room. Increadibley disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: This Little Guy Brings It!
customer_reviews.text: Good source of sound for my morning shower and the time I need to get ready for the day. The bathroom is the perfect place for listening to music with this kind of speaker, the sound quality is great as long as the sound is contained to an amount of space that is not much larger than about 10'x10'. I've seen quite a few posts about issues with this Bose product but for me I'm really satisfied and happy with the performance and quality of this little guy!
customer_reviews.author: DaddyPa 2-4

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love Bose..but have to say this little unit could be louder for the price. I am a little disappointed with the volume limits on this unit. great sound quality as Bose is known for but it just does not go loud enough. I purchased to replace my Harmon Kardon for portability reasons but it doesn't quite make it's match. Overall it is good for small areas and serves it's purpose, but not exactly a party radio with big crowds. the sound will be drowned out. Battery is pretty good on longevity, and blue tooth connection is simple. Great seller delivery though, super fast! would purchase from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Joann G.

product_meta.title: Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth Speaker II - Soft Black
product_meta.description: Color:Soft blackFrom the pool to the park to the patio, the SoundLink Color Bluetooth speaker II provides full range, portable sound anywhere you go. Advanced Bose technology packs big sound into a small, water resistant speaker that’s durable enough to take with you however the day unfolds, even if it’s next to the pool. It’s durably built, with an easy touch silicone texture that won’t slip out of your hand when you’re on the move. And it’s just as simple to use—voice prompts tell you what device you’re paired to so you don’t have to guess, and if you’re using an NFC enabled device, just pair with a tap. Need to keep the music flowing? You’re covered with up to 8 hours of music, and it’s rechargeable via Micro B USB. There’s even a built in speakerphone to handle calls without holding your phone. Also download the Bose Connect app to drag and drop Bluetooth connections, unlock features and access updates down the line. This small colored wireless speaker is available in Aquatic Blue, Coral Red, Soft Black or Polar White. Included: SoundLink Color Bluetooth speaker II; USB cable.
feature_bullets: Innovative Bose technology packs bold sound into a small, water resistant speaker
Built-in mic for speakerphone to take clear conference or personal calls out loud with a wireless range of approximately 30 feet.
Rugged, with a soft touch silicone exterior that makes it easy to pick up and go
Voice prompts talk you through Bluetooth pairing so it’s easier than ever or even quick-pair with NFC devices
Lithium-ion battery lets you enjoy up to 8 hours of play time, rechargeable with USB power sources
Wireless Bluetooth pairing with voice prompts allows you to easily take calls and access your phone’s virtual assistant — hands free
Pair two SoundLink speakers together for party mode or stereo mode or use Bose SimpleSync technology to pair with a member of the Bose Smart Home Family to play in sync

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars16,212 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #9 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#173 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
